title: At the sign of the owl
creator_credit: Colin Dean, R. Maslyn Williams, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Herschells Films
brief_description: Surveys the activities of the Council of Adult Education in organising cultural activities throughout Victoria, showing particularly the annual Summer School conducted at Albury. The school extends over ten days and provides opportunities for the study of art and crafts, music, opera and drama.
creator_credit_for_label: Colin Dean, R. Maslyn Williams, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Herschells Films
